title: How long until player like these get punished?
body:
This person int every game, goes afk in my game at level 2, comes back 10 minutes later, proceeds to do nothing but farm then walk to lane to give enemy kills. They don't say anything and build regular so it looks like they're having a bad game.
https://imgur.com/ZNqJ2K3

replies.body: Right after they finish punishing every player that gets mad at them first. :3
theres a difference between people getting mad at them and verbally abusing them vs people getting mad at them and not verbally abusing

> [{quoted}](name=YoloYeet,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=lxarjFFu,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-03-25T19:27:12.299+0000)
>
> theres a difference between people getting mad at them and verbally abusing them vs people getting mad at them and not verbally abusing

Yeah and the difference is: one group of people are vocal about the trolls and the others just stay silent and **pretend** everything's fine only because they're **scared of being punished**. Not sure what exactly was your point here?
Riot punishes you for speaking at all. Its calles thought policing.

i dont a problem with the people staying silent. do you?

my point was why should we ban people who only got mad at another person?
They don't pretend it's fair, they just aren't as stupid as the others to violate rules.

> [{quoted}](name=ﬂoo,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=lxarjFFu,comment-id=0000000100000001,timestamp=2019-03-25T20:58:15.523+0000)
>
> They don't pretend it's fair, they just aren't as stupid as the others to violate rules.

I didn't say they pretend it's fair, what do you mean?

What's stupid is pretending that you're fighting toxicity while most -if not all- you did is set up an automated word filter to punish tilted people and leaving people that cause that frustration unpunished, because soft inting, semi-afking and overall trolling isn't as easy to catch without moving a finger.  
So yeah, lets pretend everthing's fine about that.

Let's say you have this trynd in your game, you write "report trynd pls" or anything along those lines. Tryndamere reports you. BAAM, chat restriction! It's not 100% guaranteed but there is a chance, if you got chat restricted before that, then it's almost guaranteed to happen. 
If that is possible, why is it impossible for people to get punished for getting mad without verbally abusing them?

sorry im not quite understanding what you're saying,

as to "why is it impossible for people to get punished for getting mad without verbally abusing them?" this
i think it should be impossible for people to get punished getitng mad and not verbally abusing them.

People get banned for asking others to ban a troll, so saying anything to a troll, even not verbally abusing them, might be punished, you have no 100% certainty. So I'm asking, if that can get you punished, is it really impossible for someone to get banned for getting mad, even without verbally abusing? 

Now, I actually checked something.
In summoner code it says "Don't rage, blame", so getting mad can get you banned, if you get mad and say something along the lines "it's your fault we are losing, get yourself together and play with us so we can win" you are not verbally abusing him, but you are breaking the summoner's code.
If you say anything or even say nothing u can get reported by trolls.  Riot customer care just ignores this and tells you its your fault.  No justice, but that is what you get for a free game.
A free dying game...this shit got combated more a while ago. The game is on the decline...I wouldn't be shocked if people there that are smart know to get off the ship now.

Source: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/375855633569808385/431213367810588672/unknown.png (tantram's comment)

Wait, wait, wait. I want to actually contest some of those arguments from the screenshot.
1. Stealing farm is punishable? So, if I had that game where a jungler came, took 3 waves off of me, I could have reported him and he would get banned? If adc roams mid and manages to steal all creeps from midlaner is it punishable? (that one happens quite often actually, mid usually can't clean out a wave early at once, especially if he wants to conserve some mana, so adc can just lasthit all of it)
2. KSing is punishable? Since when? People KS all the time, I do it often as Pyke, that's literally how this champ works, but people still get mad when you just come up and ult someone on low hp. Should I be afraid of being banned? Oh, the argument doesn't work only for Pyke? I can make up different scenarios.
3. I've never seen anyone actually get banned for leaving your team when a teamfight breaks out, and I can see that kind of behavior at least once a week, and I don't play that many games. 
I really hope he knows it's either bullshit or they will really enforce those things, hard.

On the other hand, he first says picking off-meta isn't griefing or trolling, yet later he gives that as an example of his trolling. "to tilt teammates" yea, I get tilted when people pick Pyke support when I'm adc unless they are main support and play Pyke often. Some people are tilted every time you pick something off-meta.

Ok, I just wanted to write it, not directed at anyone, except Tantram, I guess.

Here's the thing- none of the things you mentioned are usually bannable, but this guy used it to his advantage, aka, to "legally troll" as I like to call it.
And that's what scares me the most. Like you said, some examples you provided are done quite often in everyday games, so they're not hard to do. Literally any1 knowing this can troll just as much as this guy and get eway with it. And yet, despite Tantram himself exposing this, nothing has been done.

> I really hope he knows it's either bullshit or they will really enforce those things, hard.
> 

Neither, it wasn't bs since he used it to troll, and yet riot won't enforce those things because of legit players.

> On the other hand, he first says picking off-meta isn't griefing or trolling, yet later he gives that as an example of his trolling. "to tilt teammates" yea, I get tilted when people pick Pyke support when I'm adc unless they are main support and play Pyke often. Some people are tilted every time you pick something off-meta.
> 

Riot, for some reason, want's to leave off-meta as a "gray area" (non punishable but punishable if it's being done for malicious reason which are impossible to detect, as shown) even tho they were pushing the game in direction which leaves very little room for off-meta picks. 
Riot should be more strict with off-meta in terms of rules if you're asking me. Let's be real, the vast majority of players aren't playing off-meta on a regular basis, and those that do are often using it to fuck around and/or troll.

This being said i'm quite sure every single report is logged and tracked. As I said in my message I would be really surprised if the guy tantram is talking about in his post had played 500 games in a month.

I mean if you're seriously trolling, you'll probably get at least 4 a game. And when some trolls serially like this, chances are he plays.. a lot... like a lot a lot... So 125 games in a month, 4 games a day roughly isn't too terrible much.

They don't give a fuck about trolls or soft afks as long as they aren't actually running it down mid, leave the game all the way, or typing no tolerance words in chat. I've actually made two posts on the subject over the last week myself because it's really ruining my enjoyment of the game. I can deal with mean language, I can deal with bad people who are trying to win, but I can't deal with getting someone on my team who deliberately tries to ruin the experience every 5 games or so.
